lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because:
I admire & respect people who are working to better their circumstances or make life better for their families & want to help.
One unexpected benefit I have already received from the short time I have been doing this is that these people are actually an inspiration to ME. So I guess you could say it is a symbiotic connection, & that can only be good all around!
lender.occupational_info: I sew clothing for children among other items in my home & sell them on the Internet. I take care of the home I share with my husband & 7 pets, grow my own food & herbs.

lender.name: Jessica

lender.name: Chinh Nguyen

lender.name: Just-Faith
lender.loan_because: We are trying to follow in Christ's foot steps in reaching out to the poor. We are also inspired by Muhammad Yunus and the Grameen Bank who have helped transform the economy of Bangladesh, and who were recipients of the Nobel Peace Prize in 2006.
lender.occupational_info: We are alums of a 32-week program that transformed us about social justice. This was our first group action to promote justice for the poor. Graduates have gone on to jail ministry, inter-faith peace, advocate for peace in Palestine, and helping the homeless among other activities.

lender.name: Jason Kendall
lender.loan_because:
As a UNIX admin who supports global foreign currency exchange trading, I am part of the Evil Global Empire. So, I figure I have to mitigate part of my time in the seventh circle with an occasional good deed. However, we all know how such spiritual payola goes, so I guess it is just a generally good thing to do. And now that it CAN be done with ease, why not support it? I mean, for $50, I could take out my wife to eat at a relatively good Manhattan restaurant, or do this. All works to be the same I guess. The money I would spend at the restaurant helps the Mexican immigrants who do the dishes to send remittances back to Chiapas or wherever. But this just seems a little more direct. In all, it is an interesting way to be a filla... philo... philly... good-deed-doer.
Second, I used to work on the 104th Floor of the World Trade Center, and was a few minutes late that day. The picture on this page was from my desk in that office. What the developing world needs is responsible financial support to give hope to people and counteract the destructive influence of hyper-radical Islam. Funding a farmer, cobbler, tailor, or cook helps make a real life for real people.
They are just asking for a shot at dignity and independence.
Give them a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers all day long. I help with global finance by making those computing systems work better.

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: I still believe its better 2 give then 2 receive.
lender.occupational_info: Paint, draw and be good to your surroundings.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I empower individuals to choose and decide based on their heart and soul.

lender.name: Fabiano
lender.loan_because: ---- Google translation ---- Because it is gratifying to know that the little that donated can help in any way another person.
lender.occupational_info: ---- Google translation ---- I graduated in Graphic Design and job creating home for 3 years and edit videos 2 years ago. I noticed that the web pages that meet missing in one place tourist information on regions of my country, mainly in video (also tv). Then created a Web page where each company will have its own page with the right to 5 sections: videos, gallery, text information, comments and contact form. For that I am available 1 videographer, 1 journalist and 1 graphic design. Lack only equipment for filming (camera).

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone else to live a better life in a productive way. They can be proud of themselves and stand on their own two feet gaining personal pride and independence as well as professional pride.
lender.occupational_info: I help people restyle and prepare their homes or businesses for resale. The housing market in the Netherlands is becoming more dynamic so the American-born industry of "home staging" or "verkoopstyling" has come to the Netherlands.

lender.loan_because: As a couple, we immigrated to Canada from the U.S., so we're sensitive to how difficult it can be to make a new start in life.
lender.occupational_info: Bernd believes in recycling existing objects and transforming them into new works of beauty. In some ways, that's what each of us does with our lives as we embark on a new beginning. Tim is always thinking of new ways to be of service to others.

lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance! Kiva has given me a way to touch others &it makes me feel that I can help other people believe in themselves.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Mama told me when I was young Come sit beside me, my only son And listen closely to what I say. And if you do this It will help you some sunny day. Take your time... dont live too fast, Troubles will come and they will pass. Forget your lust for the rich mans gold All that you need is in your soul, And you can do this if you try. And be a simple kind of man. Be something you love and understand.
lender.occupational_info: I've been working in a medically oriented field for almost ten years now, from service to direct care of sick and injured patients and their families. I truely enjoy the work that I do and the things I can accomplish when I'm at work.

lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people in need helping themselves.
lender.occupational_info: On a daily basis I work on improving business processes by finding (creative) solutions for improving these processes and applying IT where the benefits outweigh the costs of the required investment.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Nerdyapplebottom
lender.loan_because: I can and I should and I love to.

lender.loan_because: I want my kids to know it isn't all about us. There are people in this world that have nothing and we need to give to them. Giving is Receiving!
lender.occupational_info: I do a little of everything. I take care of my family. I homeschool and chauffer my kids to all their activites.

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: A small amount of money can change a person's future!

lender.loan_because: True satisfaction comes from doing something for someone who can never repay you.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have been an entrepreneur for many years and I am deeply inspired by Kiva.org's amazingly brilliant contribution to this world. Thank you for making it so easy for us to follow in your footsteps!
lender.occupational_info: I ask questions that help people get very clear about their passions and their strengths; then I help them connect with people who share their vision so they can manifest their dreams TOGETHER (and never feel alone again!)
